data.title: Your big questions about race, answered
data.meta_description: Racism is a complicated subject -- and a hard one to talk about honestly. CNN reached out to experts on race to help answer your tough questions.
data.text:
Race is a thorny topic, and for people seeking to understand othersâ racism â or their own â it can be difficult to know where to turn.

So please consider this a safe space where you can pose questions you may hesitate to ask elsewhere. To help answer them, weâve reached out to scholars and other experts on race. Send us your questions â thereâs a place to do that at the bottom of this page â and weâll try to answer those, too.

Our purpose here is not to chide, preach or settle historical scores. Weâre all in this together. And we all have questions. Here are some of yours.
